description.en:
Soft Background Remover is an advanced tool that uses AI technology to remove image backgrounds effortlessly. 
 Perfect for creating professional-looking photos for e-commerce, social media, and more. 
 It works 100% offline, ensuring your data privacy without needing an internet connection. 
 With an intuitive interface, you can easily upload your images, adjust settings, and save results in various formats. Try Soft Background Remover and transform your photos with ease and safety.

ğŸ¨ FEATURES

HOME SCREEN:

 âœ… Background color selection 
 âœ… Batch processing
âœ… Update check
âœ… Drag & Drop files
âœ… Log cleaning
âœ… "About" window
